StorageUploadWithoutLengthCheck.antipattern_message: Azure Storage upload API without length parameter detected. Use upload API with length parameter instead.

ServiceBusReceiverAsyncClientCheck.antipattern_message: Use of ServiceBusReceiverAsyncClient detected. Use ServiceBusProcessorClient instead.

GetSyncPollerOnPollerFluxCheck.antipattern_message: Use of getSyncPoller() on a PollerFlux detected. Directly use SyncPoller to handle synchronous polling tasks
